aws_wafregional_byte_match_set.description: Provides a AWS WAF Regional ByteMatchSet resource for use with ALB.

name.description: The name or description of the ByteMatchSet.

byte_match_tuples.description: that you want AWS WAF to search for in web requests. ByteMatchTuple documented below.

field_to_match.description: Settings for the ByteMatchTuple. FieldToMatch documented below.

positional_constraint.description: Within the portion of a web request that you want to search.

target_string.description: The value that you want AWS WAF to search for. The maximum length of the value is 50 bytes.

text_transformation.description: The formatting way for web request.

data.description: When the value of Type is HEADER, enter the name of the header that you want AWS WAF to search, for example, User-Agent or Referer. If the value of Type is any other value, omit Data.

type.description: The part of the web request that you want AWS WAF to search for a specified string.

id.description: The ID of the WAF ByteMatchSet.
